Boolean that shows if the worker thread should still run
Return value of a main-loop operation
IM Data that is used by the main-loop, NULL if nothing should be processed
Berkeley-Socket-API server address
Socket handle
Boolean that shows if a working socket is available
Buffer for received data
Buffer for data that needs to be send

The IP-Address of the agent server process
The server port of the agent server process

Defines if the plugin should accept or reject new authorization requests

Unlock send buffer access

Transform header to host byte-order
buf
Pointer to header

Transform header to network byte-order
buf
Pointer to header

Prints a packet Packets needs to be in host byte-order
buf
Pointer to send or receive buffer

memberdef.argsstring: (const char *str, unsigned int *argnum, unsigned int *bytecnt, amh *header)
memberdef.name: sendpackstr

detaileddescription.para:
Add a string to packet, will auto-increment message length, argument number and byte position
str
String pointer which contents will be added to the packet
argnum
Pointer to the current argument number of added string, auto-incremented
bytecnt
Pointer to the curent byte count, auto-incremented
header
Pointer to a send header

memberdef.argsstring: (PIDGIN_PUPPET_RETVAL rval, unsigned int *argnum, unsigned int *bytecnt, amh *header)
memberdef.name: sendpackstatus

detaileddescription.para:
Packs return status to header
rval
The status to be added
argnum
Pointer to argument number
bytecnt
Pointer to current byte count
header
Pointer to the header
On P_OK only one slot is used

Returns the offset to the first byte after header
numofargs
Number of arguments to reserve space for
Number of reserved bytes including header

Returns pointer to a receive buffer entry
bufptr
Pointer to a header
num
Entry no., starts at 0
out_offset
Pointer to the offset entry, optional
Pointer to the string data requested
Deconstructs a message and calls the appropriate command Notify agent of success of the received and processed command
Checks if message arrives and stores it to buffer
Establish connection to agent
Close the socket

Thread to handle network communication with agent
data
Internal pointer to additional data, unused

Starts the agent listener May return: P_OK, P_GENERIC_FAIL
Status code resulting from executed operation

Stops the agent listener May return: P_OK
Status code resulting from executed operation

Notify Agent for state change May return: P_OK
state
Internal state code to notify for
data
Pointer to data used in switch-case statement
Status code resulting from executed operation

Check if buddy is online, untested May return: P_OK, P_BAD_PTR, P_NO_ACCOUNT, P_NO_MATCH
buddyname
Name of buddy to check for state
retval
Pointer to return value to write to (gboolean)
Status code resulting from executed operation

Gets a list of all registered accounts May return: P_OK, P_BAD_PTR, P_NO_DATA
list
Pointer to list reference, will be initialized by function
size
Pointer to size of list, that will be returned
Status code resulting from executed operation Bug
This function is untested.

Switch to a specific account for further actions ("user@server/resource"), if prot_id == NULL use xmpp Needs to be called before every thing else If not, most operations will fail with P_NO_ACCOUNT May return: P_OK, P_NO_MATCH
accountname
Pointer to account name string ("user@server/resource" for xmpp)
prot_id
Pointer to libpurple protocol id string, optional, xmpp is default
Status code resulting from executed operation

Returns all buddies in selected account, returned list needs to be freed with g_slist_free if operation succeeded May return: P_OK, P_BAD_PTR, P_NO_DATA
list
Pointer to list reference, will be initialized by function, needs to be freed with g_slist_free if operation succeeded
size
Pointer to size of list, that will be returned
Status code resulting from executed operation

Send Message to buddy using Chat Messages May return: P_OK
buddy
Pointer to buddy name
msg
Pointer to message that will be send to buddy
Status code resulting from executed operation
Should only be called from main thread Bug
This function is not implemented.

Send Message to buddy using Instant Messaging May return: P_OK, P_BAD_PTR, P_NO_MATCH
buddy
Pointer to buddy name
msg
Pointer to message that will be send to buddy
Status code resulting from executed operation
Should only be called from main thread

Add a buddy to current account and send authorization request May return: P_OK, P_NO_ACCOUNT
buddyname
Pointer to buddy name that will be added
Status code resulting from executed operation

Sets state to on-/offline May return: P_OK, P_NO_ACCOUNT
online
True for inline, False for Offline
Status code resulting from executed operation
